item.title: LOG 1.14: A Trip to GÃ¶ttingen
item.description: 10th April, 2011 Hello everyone ðŸ™‚ I just returned from a trip to GÃ¶ttingen where my flatmates and I celebrated an old flatmate’s birthday. We took a train yesterday morning and I was quite taken in by the beauty of the countryside.

item.title: 7 Steps which will make your blog more popular!
item.description: I love writing. Whether it is pen on paper or finger-tips on keys, the feeling I get when I express myself is uniquely gratifying. In some ways, it doesn’t matter whether people are reading my post or not, because the sheer pleasure of writing is really enough of a motivation.

item.title: What I learnt from my Grandmother
item.description: On Gandhi’s birthday I think of two people. One is my cousin who shares his birthday and the other is my maternal grandma who taught me most of what I know about Gandhian values.
